question: David Li has been appointed as the Chief Executive Officer (India operations) of which global technology company?
explanation:
China-based global technology company Huawei has recently named David Li as the Chief Executive Officer of its India operations.
David Li is set to replace the previous CEO Jay Chen, who will now look after the Asia Pacific Region operations. David Li had joined Huawei in 2002 and has served in various designations in India including Vice President (Sales). He was last serving as the CEO of Cambodia region.
